mapper.sql: rowid, COMPANY_CODE, PRO_NO, DEVICE_TYPE_CODE, E_NAME, C_NAME, IS_PK, IS_NOT_NULL, D_TYPE, ENUM_SOURCE, DIM_SEARCH, DIM_MAPRENDER, DIM_ORDER, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS, PRO_NAME, DEVICE_TYPE_NAME,DIM_LIST,IS_FEATURE
mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.pro_name, t3.device_type_name, t4.category_code, t4.category_name from power_device_base_attr_field t1 left join pm_base t2 on t2.pro_no=t1.pro_no left join power_device_type t3 on t3.device_type_code = t1.device_type_code left join pm_category t4 on t4.category_code = t2.category_code where t1.rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into power_device_base_attr_field (rowid, COMPANY_CODE, PRO_NO, DEVICE_TYPE_CODE, E_NAME, C_NAME, IS_PK, IS_NOT_NULL, D_TYPE, ENUM_SOURCE, DIM_SEARCH, DIM_MAPRENDER, DIM_ORDER, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS, ENUM_VALUE,DIM_LIST,IS_FEATURE ) values (#{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isNotNull,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enumSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dimSearch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dimMaprender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dimOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 1, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enumValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{dimList,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{isFeature,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update power_device_base_attr_field
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = now(),
COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_NO = #{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_TYPE_CODE = #{deviceTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
E_NAME = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_NAME = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_PK = #{isPk,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_NOT_NULL = #{isNotNull,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_FEATURE = #{isFeature,jdbcType=INTEGER},
D_TYPE = #{dtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ENUM_SOURCE = #{enumSource,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DIM_LIST = #{dimList,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DIM_SEARCH = #{dimSearch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DIM_MAPRENDER = #{dimMaprender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DIM_ORDER = #{dimOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENUM_VALUE = #{enumValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
